vote.titulo: > Stimmen Sie f√ºr Alonsals n√§chste Sprache!
vote.descricao:
***The language that receives the most votes will be added!***

Which one will you choose? What would you like to see here?

Help him win! auto_repl auto_repl
Vote using the buttons below before
vote.rodape: The vote is per user, you can change your vote during the voting!
vote.voto_registrado:

vote.votacao_encerrada_1:

Many thanks to everyone who participated!
We received `auto_repl` votes while the poll was open!
To the participants, you now have the auto_repl `Voter` badge!
vote.votacao_encerrada_2:
**With `auto_repl` votes, the language that received the most votes was auto_repl!!! auto_repl auto_repl**
It will be added fully to Alonsal in the coming days!
Use the command </language:1018632996787589284> anytime to change yours!

telemetria.descricao:
For a better functioning of Alonsal, we use several anonymized data to decide which functionalities to pay more attention and improve in the future.

This data can come from all the functions of the bot, the most important being the commands, when using a command, like this from /telemetry, the bot records the interaction in its history of commands issued and displays a short summary of which server the command was used, as shown in the print attached below.

Other data we also collect is listed below:
`Servers input and output (bot)`, `Total servers, channels and users that the bot can view`, `Errors that occur during a command`, `Text messages for experiences/level`, `Bufunfas movements`, `Channels that receive free game updates`, and finally those last ones that are updated daily:

`Commands fired, errors, experience granted, messages valid for xp, bufunfas distributed and moved, and "known" servers, channels and users.`
telemetria.rodape: üî∞ | It is worth noting that the text entries are also hidden, making the typed content not visible for your privacy.

Durch Ihren Bericht wird der folgende Benutzer zu meiner Fehlverhaltensliste hinzugef√ºgt.

Sie k√∂nnen w√§hlen, ob Sie andere Server √ºber diese Aufnahme benachrichtigen, diesen Benutzer stillschweigend hinzuf√ºgen oder diesen Bericht abbrechen m√∂chten.

Ihr Bericht f√ºgt alle Benutzer, die mit Recht von diesem Server gesperrt wurden, zu meiner Liste ungezogener Benutzer hinzu.

Automatisch importierte Benutzer werden auf anderen Servern nicht erw√§hnt, sondern erscheinen in ihren Listen mit dem Befehl </verify guild:1094346210636214306>. wenn sie Mitglieder einer solchen sind.

tasks.ativo:
Tasks will now be shown globally.
You'll be able to see all your lists and tasks on any server I'm on too!
tasks.desativo:
Tasks will now be shown by server, separately.
You can create lists with the same name for different servers.

public.ativado: Server name will be shown in global ranking for all servers now!
public.desativado: The server will no longer be shown in the global ranking.

emojis.permissao: I don't have the permission to manage the emojis and stickers on this server.

broadcast.desligado: Broadcast is turned off on this server.
broadcast.canal_invalido: I can't send messages on this channel, it's not possible to start a Broadcast here!
broadcast.descricao:
Click below to let Solondo know you want to Broadcast.

By requesting a Broadcast, Solondo will be able to see this chat ID and connect to chat with you remotely through me!
All messages that are sent sent in this channel, can be seen by Solondo as well.

It is possible to attach images and files in the chat too! (there's a lot of technology here)

If you disable the server's Broadcast, or Solondo is offline for 5 minutes, this link will be automatically turned off.
broadcast.solicitacao_aberta: A new Broadcast request has been opened
broadcast.pedido_registrado: Your Broadcast request has been registered!
broadcast.ativado_button: It is now possible to perform Broadcasts on this server.
broadcast.desativado_button: Broadcast between servers has been turned off.

logger.ativado: Server event log is now active, all events will be sent on auto_repl channel
logger.desativado:
Server event log is now disabled
Use </panel guild:1107163338930126869>, or command </conf log:1094346210636214304> mentioning a channel to enable again!
logger.falta_vinculo: It is necessary to configure a channel with the command </conf log:1094346210636214304> before being able to activate it through the panel.

spam.ativado:
The anti-spam module has been activated! auto_repl
Channel mentioned will be used for logger ( </conf log:1094346210636214304> ) also if it is activated.

If you use logger command mentioning another channel, anti-spam will send all reports on the same logger channel, and vice versa
(both modules use the same auto_repl channel)
spam.desativado: The anti-spam module has been disabled.
